bibl.title: A Letter from the King of the Blemmyes to the King of the Noubades.
bibl.note: Qasr Ibrîm, Ve siècle. - Un appendice (pp. 168-170) contient des observations d'Eric G. Turner. - P. 170: Triumphal Inscription of Silko at Talmis (Kalabsha) (O.G.I.S. I, 201).
Skeat T.C., A Letter from the King of the Blemmyes to the King of the Noubades.
JEA 63 (1977) pp. 159-170, 1 p. h. t. et pl. XXVII.
